plays.text: Penalty to Peter Bondra 2 minutes for Tripping Eric Boguniecki
Penalty to Ken Klee 2 minutes for Holding the Stick Reed Low
Penalty to Jason Doig 2 minutes for High Sticking Keith Tkachuk
Goal scored by Scott Mellanby assisted by Doug Weight and Al MacInnis
Goal scored by Josh Green assisted by Brendan Witt and Robert Lang
Penalty to Martin Rucinsky 2 minutes for Slashing Brendan Witt
Goal scored by Jaromir Jagr assisted by Robert Lang and Kip Miller
Penalty to Kip Miller 2 minutes for Obstruction - Hooking Doug Weight
Penalty to Doug Weight 2 minutes for Diving Kip Miller
Penalty to Bryce Salvador 2 minutes for Holding Jaromir Jagr
Goal scored by Dainius Zubrus assisted by Mike Grier and Sergei Gonchar
Goal scored by Keith Tkachuk assisted by Scott Mellanby and Pavol Demitra
Goal scored by Pavol Demitra assisted by Keith Tkachuk and Al MacInnis
Goal scored by Al MacInnis assisted by Doug Weight and Martin Rucinsky
Penalty to Bryce Salvador 2 minutes for Hooking Ivan Ciernik
Penalty to Brendan Witt 2 minutes for Holding the Stick Shjon Podein
Goal scored by Keith Tkachuk assisted by Bryce Salvador
